text: Please tell us a little more about yourself in an essay no larger than 1000 words.
help: Feel free to answer any combination of the following questions:
questions: What are questions you wished you asked yourself five years ago?
Which technology do you wish existed and which technology do you wish did not exist?
Where are you from and how did that shape the person you are today?
What is your favorite educational or collaborative experience?
Zombies are attacking the building, you do what?
Who are your heroes and what do you admire about them?
